channel.title: Comments on: The Bitcoin Podcast #388- Joshua of Opolis

item.description: […] In this interview only Jessie, Dee, and Corey speak with Joshua of Opolis on how as an individual you can be paid in Crypto and still have a W-2. Social Media Opolis Website: https://opolis.co/ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxpG_XyDTUvYmrTfiexmU2A Twitter:https://twitter.com/opolis Telegram:https://t.me/Opolis Discord: https://discord.com/invite/p9FQHYhxcM Github:https://github.com/opolis/ Request: opolis.typeform.com/RequestLLC Request:Commons.opolois.co Joshua Telegram: t.me/f0xJoshua PFP: https://nftp.fun/ DAO: Daohaus.club The Bitcoin Podcast Social Media Join-Slack: https://launchpass.com/thebitcoinpodcast Patreon:https://www.patreon.com/TheBitcoinPodcastNetwork Website: / Twitter: https://twitter.com/thebtcpodcast DADDAO: https://daddao.org/ Source link […]
